post:
I thought as this is just a general offer not an LES Exclusive I would take the time to share it here too although it is a shameless copy-paste of the original thread on LES Phoenix Double Storage || NAT Bundle || UK KVM 256MB €10 /year || UK KVM 2GB €29.95 /year — LowEndSpirit

Many of you will be the same crowd forked from the LET community so probably know me already, I but I am sure there are some new faces as well for the latter I Own/Operate Inception Hosting Limited, a UK based company formed in 2010.

I have just finished doing a big audit of everything, I have some irregular space, due to plan size changes over the years and some nodes being almost full but still some space left from cancellations etc so I thought I would do a bit of a mix.

Please note these will last until I need to stop them I can’t put a specific time scale on it, they could vanish in an hour some might still work in 2 weeks.

I have tried to make them appealing to the LE* crowd.

Phoenix Storage plans

All plans from the KVM500 and bigger get double the advertised storage space automatically, for example, the KVM500 plan gets 1000GB and costs €6.25 for 3 months.

Order Link: Shopping Cart - Inception Hosting

SOLD OUT

NAT Bundle

€8 /year for all 3.

Netherlands, Phoenix USA and London UK.

OpenVZ 7

  • 1 CPU Core
  • 128mb Ram
  • 2GB Disk Space
  • 350 GB Transfer p/Month
  • /64 IPv6 range
  • 1 x NAT IPv4
  • Orders manually accepted within 24 hours - not instant setup

NOTE: You need to set up each product one at a time, you will be taken to the next location when you complete the first, please use a minimum of 4 characters in the hostname or provisioning will fail and setup will be significantly delayed.

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&bid=19

UK SSD Cached KVM 256MB

€10 /year

  • 2 CPU Cores (Equal Share)
  • 256 MB Ram
  • 10 GB SSD Cached Disk space
  • 350 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
  • 1 x IPv4 address
  • 1 x /64 IPv6

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=175

UK SSD Cached KVM 2GB

€29.95 /year

  • 4 CPU Cores (Equal Share)
  • 2 GB Ram
  • 40 GB Disk space
  • 2000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
  • 1 x IPv4 address
  • 1 x /64 IPv6

Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=164

Terms tl;dr

  • No tor
  • Torrent abuse report = bye bye
  • No open proxies
  • No auto click/scam bots
  • No crypto mining
  • No bulk mailing
  • If you don’t actually read the terms they still apply
  • Orders will be auto rejected if placed via a proxy or VPN

You cannot swap/change your current plan/product to any of these but you are obviously welcome to cancel the current ones and take one of these, you will not get any credit though, I am able to do these in limited quantities only.
